snippet: The major networks and local TV stations are planning to raise money to help the people who were affected by this week’s storm.
abstract: Major networks, including NBC, CBS, ABC and Fox, along with local television stations, are planning to raise money in one-hour telethon and use of public service announcement to encourage American Red Cross donations in effort to help victims of Hurricane Sandy.

byline.original: By BRIAN STELTER and DAVE ITZKOFF

lead_paragraph: The major networks and local TV stations are planning to raise money to help the people who were affected by this week’s storm.

headline.seo: Telethons Planned to Aid Storm Victims
headline.main: TV Medium Is Planning Storm Relief by Telethon
headline.print_headline: TV Medium Is Planning Storm Relief By Telethon
